title: National Day of Prayer
description: Join of for National Day of Prayer from 6-7 at the Cornerstone Bible Church.

title: Nursery Parents Meeting
description: A brief introductory meeting for parents of nursery and preschool-aged children to meet the new nursery directors will be held following the morning service.

title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring a non-perishable food item for our local food bank.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center Ministry
description: This Sunday, March 9th, we have the opportunity to minister to the residents at BVLC. Please come and worship with these dear people at 2:30PM at BVLC.

title: Ladies Potluck Luncheon
description: All ladies are invited to a potluck luncheon. Please bring your favorite dish to share. Laura Fricke will be giving her testimony.

title: Baptism
description: We will be having a baptism at the Florence Bridge on Sunday, May 18th, after the morning service. If you would like to be baptized, please contact one of the pastors listed on the back of the bulletin.

title: VBS Planning Meeting
description: If you are planning to help with VBS, please join us us for a planning meeting after the service.

title: Vacation Bible School
description: Save the dates for VBS 2025! Your kids won't want to miss this summer highlight!
